text: Sean Patrick Hayes (born June 26, 1970) is an American actor, comedian, and producer. He is best known for his role as Jack McFarland on the NBC sitcom Will & Grace. During the series he won an Emmy Award, four SAG Awards, and one American Comedy Award, and earned six Golden Globe nominations. After Will & Grace he guest starred in programs such as 30 Rock, Portlandia and Parks and Recreation. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT people from Chicago Category:LGBT producers Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners
title: Sean Hayes (actor)
